title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story
writer: Ian Bonhôte, Otto Burnham, Peter Ettedgui
actors: Christopher Reeve, Will Reeve, Dana Reeve
plot: Reeve's rise to becoming a film star follows with a near-fatal horse-riding accident in 1995 that left him paralyzed from the neck down. After the accident, he became an activist for spinal cord injury treatments and disability ri...
awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. 30 wins & 30 nominations total
